mapper.select: select * from (select a.*, rowNum rn from (select * from tipreply order by tipreply_ref desc, tipreply_seq asc)a) where tip_no = #{tip_no}
mapper.update: update tipreply set tipreply_content = #{tipreply_content}, tipreply_date = sysdate where tipreply_no = #{tipreply_no}
update tipreply set tipreply_seq = tipreply_seq+1 where tipreply_ref = #{tipreply_ref} and tipreply_seq > #{tipreply_seq}
